para.text: In this step you are given the opportunity to choose a class of image stripper to use for the stripping process. The default choice is the
class that comes with the basic
. If you require more advanced stripping facilities you may choose to write your own class of image stripper and you can choose to install it here.

Note that the standard deployment wizard is designed to set up the basic image stripper. A more advanced stripper class may require a modified wizard in order to be able to configure it completely. You may find, however, that the
can be used to set up additional options in an alternative stripper.
